name: Mermaid Murderfest
description:
You do everything with the arrow keys.

Objective: You have 1 minute to kill as many sailors as possible! Earn points by combo stab-hopping from sailor to sailor! You also deal more damage with each combo strike! Watch out for their swords, and for sharks!

TIPS:

Eat hearts to extend time by a random amount and recover some health

Suits
